name: Gabrielle Kessler
title: SVP Brand Experience at We Are Social + Narrative

experience.title: SVP Brand Experience & Production at We Are Social + Narrative
description: Senior leader overseeing agency production and delivery across content, partnerships and earned led activations.
Experiential SME.

experience.title: VP Client Solutions
description: Oversees all B2C integrated program solutions and revenue opportunities for Future PLC, the global media company specializing in the Tech, Gaming, Music and Knowledge verticals.

experience.title: Head of Strategy, Partnerships & Revenue
description: Oversaw creative ideation, process and execution of brand integration campaigns across multiple content verticals including lifestyle, entertainment, gaming and music.

experience.title: Head of Strategy, Partnerships & Revenue
description: Led strategy and partnerships for Primetime Emmy-nominated content-driven media company.
Managed branded content activations with major brands including Samsung, Ford, Marriott, AT&T, and more.

experience.title: Head of Integrated Marketing & Director Brand Partnerships
description: Built IM department from the ground-up at the fastest growing independent MCN in the marketplace.
Oversaw creative ideation, process and execution of brand integration campaigns across multiple content verticals including lifestyle, entertainment, gaming and music.

experience.title: Director of Business Development
description: Led and oversaw the development of new business and maintained effective key agency relationships.
Contributed to the development and refinement of Something Massive's future vision and strategy.

experience.title: Senior Accounts Manager
description: Managed day-to-day operation of multiple client accounts, owning client relationships from pitch to delivery.
Worked side-by-side with senior creatives and agency partners to develop high-level digital strategy and supporting campaigns.
Strong focus on entertainment clients, including major motion picture studios and exhibitor chains.
Developed strategy and oversaw social community management teams for multiple brands.

experience.title: Project Manager
description: Project Manager for start-up video marketing agency.
Worked with clients to establish online presence through original video production, distribution, social media and SEO/VSEO marketing.
Daily responsibilities included business development, generating overarching strategy and managing day-to-day production responsibilities, budgets and timelines.

experience.title: Marketing
description: Acted as liaison between Art Directors and contract artists in Advertising, Commercial Production and Feature Film Production.
In charge of internal brand marketing and positioning.
Created and distributed all visual marketing to advertising, commercial production and film clients.
Compiled and edited video reels for promotional distribution.
Managed all website operations and SEO marketing.
In charge of all digital asset management, transfer, inventory and organization.
Spearheaded expansion of artist roster to include photo compositors, 3D artists and visual effects editors.

experience.title: Owner/Operator
description: Commercial photography, graphic design, logo and branding services for clients including musicians and actors, independent film production companies, high-end interior designers and restaurateurs.
